title: 2016 Ranked Placements are BS
body: Idk if this is with everyone but in placements, I won 8 games and lost TWICE and still got placed into bronze V. This is a real problem because in last year's placements, I won around five games or so, i dont remember, and I still got bronze 3. 8 Wins riot. 8!! Please look into this and tell me what I did wrong.     {{item:3073}}

replies.body:
Won 2 last season, got Silver V.

Won 5-5 (with trolling/feeding teammates,) get Bronze IV.

Why? I was almost always the best player in my games.
I won 7 out of 10 and got put in bronze 4. Last time I went 3 out of 10 and was put in bronze 2. I don't get it.

Seems like a lot of people are having the same problem. I believe it's intended though, you should be earning a huge amount of LP per win currently, if your MMR is above where you were placed.

Also, was last season your first season by chance? Generally speaking, when you start from a fresh slate you will be placed higher than the next season (if you remain around the same rank). Because at the end of a season your MMR is NOT hard reset. It's just a soft reset. Where-as with a fresh account, it's a blank slate.
